name: TattleRant
0:
”Alexa, open tattle rant”
”I am done”
”I want to share”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tattle rant
des:
Have you had a tough day? Somebody get on your nerves? Did they commit a personal injustice that you simply need to get off your chest? Then this is the skill for you.

The skill is pretty easy to use: once you invoke the skill, simply start talking. Stream of consciousness? By all means. Want to take some time and compose your thoughts? No problem.

We're not here to judge. We're not here to advise. We're just here to listen. All we want is for you to get whatever is bothering you off your chest so you can continue to tackle the rest of the day.

Perhaps nothing is bothering you, and you had the best day ever! That's wonderful! We're just as open to hear what you have to say and share about how awesome your day was.

If you enjoyed this skill and want to check out some of my other skills, feel free to checkout my website here:

https://amaze-in-skills.tk/

If you have comments or questions and want to contact me directly, visit the contact page on my website:

https://amaze-in-skills.tk/page/contact/

Enjoy!

(Skill icon courtesy of https://pixabay.com/illustrations/emoticon-emoji-angry-cartoon-1659663/)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
